Welcome to PyLoan's documentation!
==================================
PyLoan is a mortgage/loan calculation tool. The package is able to calculate repayment/amortization schedule, calculate interest payments using either 30/360 methods or actual methods.

========
Features
========
* Consider ad-hoc or periodic special principal repayments during loan amortization schedule.
* Calculate interest payments using either 30/360 methods or actual methods.

============
Installation
============
To install the package from PyPI run ``python -m pip install pyloan``.
